English: I have a meeting at 3 PM.
Spanish: Tengo una reunión a las 3 PM.
La fiesta empieza a las 8 en punto.

English: We will be there by 9 AM.

Spanish: El tren parte a las 6:45 PM.

English: It's 7:30 AM, time to wake up.
Spanish: Son las 7:30 AM, es hora de despertar.

English: The movie lasts for two hours.
He forgot his watch and doesn't know the time.
Spanish: Él olvidó su reloj y no sabe la hora.
Nos vemos mañana por la mañana.

English: I need to check my schedule for today.
Spanish: Necesito ver mi agenda para hoy.
Ya son las doce en punto.

English: She doesn't understand the concept of time.
Spanish: Ella no entiende el concepto del tiempo.

English: We have plenty of time to finish the task.
Spanish: Tenemos mucho tiempo para terminar la tarea.
